show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: The Story Of Ivar Kreuger
content:
The man who invented off-balance-sheet accounting that’s still sinking companies today. Listen in to find out what happened to him!
Where do the dollars go and who has access to them?
You may be surprised.
What happens to corporate cash?
Another eye-opener.
The disconnect between the official jobs numbers and the economic experience of most Americans.
Francis Fukuyama’s new book, “Political Order & Political Decay”.
Police tactics of revenge against the populace in general when two of theirs were shot.
Three reasons for which I believe the world economy is dying.
The importance of climate change (aka: global warming) versus other critical phenomena.
Two examples of the fraudulent nature of GDP.
Another gunman made it into the White House but it was five days before the Secret Service realised that a man had shot at the White House.
Well, secret is secret, right?
The trouble is, who’s going to be there for you if real nuclear warheads come flying past your window?
Please don’t keep it a secret – or, better still, don’t wait to find out.
